original: intros. unfold filterdiff in *. intros [Hlf_df Hlf_domin_f] [Hlg_df Hlg_domin_g]. split. - split. + unfold is_linear in *. intros. specialize (Hlf_domin_f x H). specialize (Hlg_domin_g (f x) H). unfold is_domin, is_domin_loc in *. intros. specialize (Hlf_domin_f y0 H0). specialize (Hlg_domin_g y0 H0). simpl.
